Programa Ferro

A critical analysis of the scriptures to sharpen and strengthen your faith.
Listen live Saturday's at 12pm on 89.1 Florianopolis, Brazil. Listen to our previous shows now!

About

This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for the Jekyll new theme at: github.com/jglovier/jekyll-new

You can find the source code for Jekyll at github.com/jekyll/jekyll

The wisest man that ever lived, Solomon, said that as iron sharpens iron, so one man sharpens another. It is our prayer that as we critically analyze the scriptures, that the God-man Jesus Christ, who is greater than Solomon, will Himself sharpen and strengthen your heart mind and soul through the Bible, the sword of the Spirit, so that you might walk closer with Him through faith.
